description:
LiveScore keeps you up to date with the latest live sports scores and live sports action. Whether you are looking for scores, goals, fixtures or news, LiveScore is your one-stop destination for top football leagues. From Premier League and UEFA Champions League, to Eredivisie, Serie A, LaLiga and more, LiveScore has it all. Stay on top of the football season with live football scores!

LIVE NOTIFICATIONS
Get fast updates to keep track of live sports scores, goals, red cards and more for multiple matches and sports at the same time. Get all the details, football stats and live football scores for the Premier League, UEFA Champions League; scores for tennis matches and more. Manage your favourite sports & match notifications in your settings.

FOR YOU
Immerse yourself in a truly personalised experience when it comes to news and headlines. With all your favourites in one place, it’s the best way for you to cut the noise and stay informed on the teams and competitions that matter to you. Check the latest news and breaking headlines from across the world of sport. After all, it's made For You.

For You covers everything from the latest insights, football news, football stats, football results, post-match reviews, player transfers and previews of upcoming football fixtures from the PL, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Primeira Liga and Eredivisie.

COMPETITIONS
Search for competitions across the biggest sports. Including worldwide premier cups and leagues with match details and soccer and football scores for the PL, the FA Cup, UEFA Champions League, LaLiga, Serie A, Eredivisie and Bundesliga.

FAVOURITE LEAGUES AND TEAMS
Get to the scores, live results and sports match news you’re interested in. Favourite your team to follow their progress in the leagues and easily see past results or upcoming fixtures. Switch on live notifications for your favourited teams to keep track of all the action & news.

TEAM PAGES AND PLAYER STATS
View your team’s upcoming fixtures, live table standings, news, scores, videos of matches and Player Stats to check top scorers and more. Perfect for keeping up with news and scores of your favourite tennis players, or for your fantasy football team.

LIVE COMMENTARY (Unofficial) FROM LIVESCORE
Listen to live match commentary (unofficial) from the LiveScore team, covering everything from scores, assists, corners, cards and descriptions of the action on football matches.

WORLDWIDE SCORES AND SPORT
Find your international team and follow live football stats, football results and scores. More than 1,000 live football scores and football fixtures are followed every week.

LIVESCORE HORSE RACING
View horse racing results, upcoming race details, jockey, trainer and horse racing form details across UK, Ireland and international racecourses. Favourite upcoming horse races to easily view every horse and jockey in the field, receive live notifications with the winning horse.

DISCOVER AMERICAN FOOTBALL
New to LiveScore is American Football! Whether you're a seasoned fan or new to the game, we've got you covered with real-time game results, stats, and fixtures for your favourite teams and leagues, including the NFL & CFL. Stay updated on the action and follow every touchdown, tackle and triumph.

ABOUT LIVESCORE
Since 1998, LiveScore has been giving you real-time delivery of live sport scores & data. As leaders of live score updates, LiveScore is trusted and used daily by millions of users globally; specialising in the sports: football, soccer, tennis, cricket, basketball & hockey.

Join over 20 million fans who trust FotMob to keep them informed.

FotMob gives you all the live scores, stats, and news you need to keep up with football from anywhere in the world. With personalized alerts and lightning fast match updates, you'll always stay informed about your favorite teams and players. Our mission is simple: We're changing the way the world follows football.

Key features include:
• Live scores with instant goal notifications
• Personalized news and alerts for your favorite clubs and players
• Home screen widgets with news and live matches
• Detailed match stats, including xG and shot maps
• Video highlights and audio commentary
• Live text commentary to follow the action as it happens
• Transfer updates and breaking news
• TV schedules so you know exactly when and where to watch
• Weekly Team of the Week (TOTW) and player ratings

We cover more than 400 competitions globally, including the Premier League, La Liga, Bundesliga, Serie A, Ligue 1, MLS, Champions League, Liga MX, FA Women’s Super League, Eredivisie, World Cup 2026, and many more.

Stay connected and share your feedback we'd love to hear from you:
X: X.com/fotmob
Instagram: instagram.com/fotmobapp
Facebook: facebook.com/fotmob
TikTok: tiktok.com/@fotmobapp
Web: www.fotmob.com

Experience the Ultimate Live Score App—Sofascore! Your go-to destination for all scores, sports statistics, and a world of sports excitement! Whether you are a passionate sports fan or a serious football fantasy manager, we have everything, from simple live scores to deep statistics and detailed player analysis. We cover 25 sports (from football and tennis to darts and cricket) and more than 5,000 leagues and tournaments. With the Sofascore app, you won’t miss a thing!

Download Sofascore now and never miss another moment in sports! 

Why choose Sofascore?

• Fast & Precise: Instant notifications, flash scores, and results – enjoy the fastest updates on the planet
• Top Leagues: Stay atop elite competitions with live scores and fixtures & find a complete season overview
• Player Insights: Detailed stats on goals, player performances, and sports events – be the first to know
• Comprehensive Coverage: Dive into all the live scores and fixtures from top leagues and tournaments worldwide

Explore Extensive Sports Features:

• Statistical Ratings: Access over 300 statistics used by pros, news sites, and analysts for a comprehensive view
• Attribute Overview: Visualize key player attributes to gauge their completeness quickly
• Attack Momentum: Track match dynamics and team pressure intensity with a unique graph
• Box Score & ShotMap: Get the details of every match—every point, assist, and shooting pattern
• Power Graph: Witness the flow of matches, showcasing the dominance level of the winning player
• Heatmap: Visualize player movements on the pitch for every match and the entire season
• Head-to-Head: Compare teams and players head-to-head, analyzing their performance history and rivalry

Discover a wide range of sports, leagues and tournaments in the Sofascore live score app:

• Football - Premier League, UEFA Champions League, UEFA Europa League, Bundesliga, LaLiga, Serie A, Ligue 1, Brasileirão Série A, UEFA European Championshio (EURO), FIFA World Cup
• Basketball - NBA, EuroLeague, FIBA World Cup, Stoiximan Basket League, Serie A, Liga ACB
• Tennis - ATP Tour, WTA Tour, Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), Davis Cup
• Table Tennis - ITTF World Table Tennis Championships, Table Tennis World Cup
• Ice Hockey - NHL, KHL, IIHF World Championship
• eSports - LoL, Dota 2, CS:GO 2
• Handball - IHF World Handball Championship, Bundesliga, EHF Champions League
• Volleyball - FIVB Volleyball World Championship, Nations League, Champions League
• Baseball - MLB, LMB, Pro Yakyu - NPB
• American Football - NFL, NCAA
• MMA - UFC, Bellator, KSW, Rizin, PFL
• Motorsport - Formula 1, NASCAR, MotoGP, WRC
• Cricket - ICC World Cup, Indian Premier League (IPL)

and the rest of the sports we cover - Rugby, Darts, Snooker, Futsal, Minifootball, Badminton, Aussie Rules, Beach Volleyball, Water polo, Cycling, Floorball, Bandy.

The official FIFA Football for Schools app is designed to help teachers throughout the world to bring the game of football to children of all ages within a playground environment. Based on a “let the game be the teacher” philosophy, we offer you 360 age-appropriate short videos designed to engage, enthuse and inspire children of all abilities. The app is your first step towards fostering children’s holistic development by introducing them to the “beautiful game”.

The FIFA Football for Schools experience is all about games, not drills!

Our playing philosophy for children in schools is to encourage the use of simple game formats in every lesson. These games can include certain types of repetition in order to improve technical and tactical development, but more importantly, they should provide children with the opportunity for social interaction within a fun and friendly environment, always building in time for free play and exploration.

Highlights:
•	360 short videos designed for age-specific child development stages: 4-7 years, 8-11 years and 12-14 years.
•	40 physical education sessions divided into fun warm-up games, skill development games and a final game incorporating variations of football.
•	Each video lasts 60-90 seconds, highlighting the organisation of players and what you will need (e.g. balls and other material).
•	The app includes illustrations to show how exercises can be adapted to meet your individual school/class needs, based on your pitch size, equipment and the number of children in your class.
•	Each of our games focuses on simple class organisation and the involvement, inclusion and engagement of all children, with opportunities for both basic skill execution and challenging progressions.
•	Each teacher can select an individual session/lesson or a programme of sessions in line with football’s place in the school’s curriculum.

Who is it for? 
•	You DO NOT HAVE TO BE A QUALIFIED FOOTBALL COACH to benefit from our app. It can be used by any physical education teacher or adult in a similar role.
•	The idea is that, after copying the sessions and exercises initially, teachers will be inspired to adapt them and then create their own as they become more familiar with the organisation and set-up of games. 
•	It is designed to equip teachers with an online toolkit of ready-made solutions – a plug and play programme that provides hours and weeks of age-appropriate football activities for physical education lessons within the school curriculum.

App features:
•	Easy to use and navigate.
•	Select your lessons based on your unique teaching circumstances.
•	Learn teaching and football techniques directly from FIFA experts.
•	Select from up to 40 lessons for your class.
•	Save your favourite lessons to build your own curriculum.
We are committed to:
•	developing the child first and the football player second;
•	providing fun games that foster social interaction and cater for individual challenges;
•	promoting the values of football as a school for life.

Download the FIFA Football for Schools app now and help us build the world’s biggest football playground!

Your ultimate live scores and sports news app. Goals, scores, and stories, all on Flashscore. Follow all the latest highlights across the world of sport, including football, tennis, basketball, hockey and much more. Choose from 30+ sports and 6000+ competitions and our tailored notifications will let you know about every important action of the match. 
 
Download Flashscore now and read the game like no one else!

Key features:
• Fastest live results: Get real-time updates with detailed statistics, xG data, unique player and team ratings, live standings and match updates.
• In-depth sports news: Stay informed with exclusive interviews, transfer news & rumours, and in-depth data analysis.
• Personalized favourites: Receive top news notifications, goal alerts, and customized reminders for your favourite teams, competitions or matches.
• Follow your favourite players: Add them to your list and allow notifications so that you never miss their presence in the starting lineup, goals, bookings or ratings.
• Expert match previews: Access selected opportunities and stats to enhance your sports prediction accuracy.
• Predicted lineups: Stay one step ahead and find out who is likely to start in the upcoming match given current form, unexpected injuries or lineup changes.
• Detailed player stats: Check out expected goals (xG), expected assists (xA), the number of shots, passes, touches, chances created, tackles, saves and other key statistics for all the players that appear on the pitch.

LIVE SPORTS SCORES & NEWS, FAST AND ACCURATE

• SPEED: Whether a goal is scored, red card issued, set or period is over, you will know at the same time as the live audience.

• DATA-DRIVEN NEWS: Breaking news and detailed coverage with unique sports data visualizations, tactical insights, expert opinions or featured articles.

• GREAT COVERAGE: You can find football live scores, tennis scores, basketball results, hockey online, golf leaderboard and more than 30 other sports (snooker, baseball, MMA ...) in our app. 


Coverage of major global events & local competitions: 
Football: Premier League, Championship, League One, League Two, FA Cup, LaLiga, Serie A, Bundesliga, Champions League (UCL), Europa League, Europa Conference League, Club World Cup
Tennis: ATP/WTA Tour tournaments including Grand Slams (Australian Open, French Open, Wimbledon, US Open), ATP Finals, Davis Cup
Basketball: NBA, Euroleague, ACB, LNB, Lega A, World Cup
Hockey: NHL, DEL, SHL, IIHF World Championship
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam, World Matchplay, UK Open, World Grand Prix
Golf: British Open (The Open), Masters, US Open, PGA Championship, Ryder Cup, Players Championship
Baseball: MLB, KBO, NPB, KBO, LVBP, LMB, World Baseball Classic
Snooker: World Championship, UK Championship, The Masters
Volleyball: SuperLega, Nations League, Nations League Women, CEV Champions League
Badminton: BWF World Championships, Thomas Cup, Uber Cup, Sudirman Cup
Darts: PDC World Championship, Premier League Darts, PDC Grand Slam
Motorsport: Formula 1 (F1), MotoGP, Moto2, Nascar, Dakar
MMA: UFC, Bellator MMA, KSW, Оktagon MMA, PFL, ONE Championship


NO MORE MISSED MATCHES OR UPDATES

• FAVOURITE TEAMS AND MATCHES: Don’t waste your time, and follow only your favourite matches, teams and competitions.

• NOTIFICATIONS AND ALERTS: Match starts, line-ups, goals - you will not miss any of it again. Just select your favorite matches and wait for your mobile device to let you know.


LIVE RESULTS, TABLES AND MATCH DETAILS

• LIVE COMMENTARY: Unable to watch the match on TV? No problem: stay up-to-date with our detailed live text commentary.

• LIVE TABLES: One goal can change a lot. Our live standings will show you if a scored goal has changed the league ranking, as well as the current top scorers table.

Create and Share Your Perfect Football Lineup with Football Lineup Builder!

Bring your team’s vision to life with Football Lineup Builder, the intuitive and powerful app for coaches, players, and passionate football fans. Whether you're preparing for match day or designing your dream Starting 11, this app gives you everything you need to build, customize, and share your ideal football formation.


Key Features:

Multiple Teams Management
Add, organize, and manage several teams in one place — local clubs, fantasy squads, or professional lineups.

Jersey Customization
Personalize your team’s jersey with unique colors, patterns, and styles.

Team Badge Upload
Upload your team’s badge or logo for a polished and professional look.

Formation Options
Choose from classic football formations or create your own strategy — from 4-4-2 to 3-5-2 and beyond.

Player Details
Add names, numbers, and positions to bring your Starting 11 to life.

Save Your Lineups
Easily save and manage your favorite formations to revisit or edit later — perfect for coaches planning tactics or players tracking setups.

High-Quality Exports
Export your lineup in high resolution — perfect for sharing or printing.


Why Choose This App?
Whether you're a coach strategizing for the next match, a player visualizing your position, or a fan creating your dream squad, this app is made for you. With an intuitive interface and powerful customization tools, Football Lineup Builder helps you design the perfect team for any occasion.

Go Pro for More Customization
Unlock advanced features, premium templates, and exclusive styling options with the Pro version. Take your creativity further and support the continued development of the app.

Your Feedback Matters
We’re always improving. Have ideas or suggestions? Let us know and help shape the future of lineup building.

Get Started Today!
From training sessions to match day to fantasy drafts, this is your go-to app to design, visualize, and share your perfect football lineup. Download Football Lineup Builder and start building your dream team now!

This is a soccer fan's, football bet predictions and tips application, that is updated daily with match predictions. It contains detailed previews of matches/games from major league in the world including, English Premier League, Spanish La Liga, German Bundesliga, Italian Serie A, USA MLA. Bet prediction should never be a guessing venture. It is your money you are placing a match prediction on after all.

Usage:
To get bet predictions of different matches select the top-left corner menu bar to open navigation panel. Click on "Predictions", wait for data to load, then select match of interest when it finishes loading. To get Prediction and Tip, Click on the "View Tip". Tips are given after the reason for prediction decision at the bottom end of the view. Therefore, scroll down.
To see Football Betting Tips, without preview details, click on the top-left corner menu bar. Select "Tips", wait for data to load. When betting tips have loaded, scroll to league of interest. 

Further Details:
Tips sections has different statuses. If a game has not been played, it has no scores and is listed as "Not Played". Played matches with the prediction successful is marked as "Success". And finally "Failed" for Tip that went wrong. Sometimes games are cancelled and not played, thus we mark such matches as "Cancelled".

To get the best of our application, use it ever day, checking both predictions and betting tips listed.

Notifications:
We shall send notifications to prompt you of the best betting opportunities from time to time. Take advantage. To control notifications, go to settings and uncheck the respective box. We hope you will allow us to send you notifications.

Disclaimer:
We do not run a betting company or business. This is informational bet prediction application that is supposed to give bet predictions and tips on matches only. Anyone soliciting money in the name of this application is a fraud and should be ignored. Anyone claiming that our predictions are also 100% sure is a fraud too. 

Our bet predictions and tips are subject to wrong conclusion. Therefore, we take NO responsibility for any loss of money through betting or any related activity.

Save Data:
This bet prediction application saves your data. Do not browse the internet where you get lots of unnecessary data loss. We have constricted the data to load just what matters to you: match predictions. Go ahead and install bet predictions now. 

WHEN THE FUN STOPS, STOP:
Be a responsible betting ninja.

This season, there's a new NFL team competing for a chance in the Super Bowl — yours! With NFL Fantasy, the official fantasy football game of the NFL, you're in control of your very own NFL team. Are you ready to build the next football dynasty?

Start your season by drafting a roster of real NFL players to join your team. Then, prepare for a new head-to-head matchup every week by setting your lineup and tuning in to NFL games to watch your player's action on the field turn into fantasy points for your team.

In a work league with a real hotshot? NFL Fantasy comes equipped with the tools you need to make it to the top, including NFL Fantasy-exclusive features like Next Gen Stats and all-new player comparison tools.

Looking to be the next Commissioner? Start your very own league and customize the rules however you want. Invite friends and family to compete with you and start your own football tradition.

Get closer to the game than ever before with the official fantasy football game of the NFL. Always 100% free.

There’s a lot to look forward to in 2025:

+ Our draft client makes drafting easy and fun. 

+ Track your fantasy scores while streaming the NFL Network and live local and primetime games. It's the ultimate fantasy game day experience.*

+ Fantasy Stories - See a ring around a player’s headshot? Click to watch exclusive player analysis, news, and sideline footage.

+ Use Compare Players to quickly find the best player for your roster.

+ Waiver Report - learn the outcome of all of your waiver claims.

+ A weekly Matchup Recap gives you a customized report of your and your opponent's performance.

+ Celebrate your league's history and achievements in Hall of Fame.

Plus, all of the fantasy football features you expect from the NFL:

+ Create a league in minutes to start your own fantasy football tradition, or compete against other NFL fans in a public league.
+ Draft players live in-app.
+ Perfect your draft strategy by participating in a Mock Draft.
+ The NFL Fantasy-exclusive Optimize Lineup feature makes fantasy football approachable for players of all skill levels.
+ Best in class Player Profiles include all of the data and expert analysis fans need to make informed roster decisions, including NFL Fantasy-exclusive features like Next Gen Stats and game video recaps.
+ Catch up with official stats, news, and injury updates direct from NFL experts.
+ The same great features and design on your iPhone and your iPad.

…and more!

*Geographic and device restrictions apply. Local & primetime games only. Data charges may apply.

BTN – Esports & Strategies – це сучасний додаток, створений спеціально для гравців, які прагнуть розвивати навички в кіберспорті та підвищувати свою ефективність у змагальних дисциплінах. Додаток поєднує в собі інструменти для тренування реакції, аїму, прийняття рішень, а також докладні тактичні посібники з популярних ігор, таких як CS:GO/CS2, Dota 2 та інші проекти змагань.
Головна ідея BTN — дати користувачеві можливість тренуватися системно та усвідомлено, наче під керівництвом професійного тренера. Для шутерів у додатку представлені модулі для розвитку точності стрільби, швидкості наведення, контролю віддачі та моментального реагування. Кожен тренажер має рівні складності, адаптується під ігровий стиль користувача та пропонує щоденні завдання для закріплення навичок. Додаток враховує прогрес, показує статистику влучень, швидкість реакції та динаміку покращень, допомагаючи гравцеві бачити реальний результат.

BTN – це повноцінна платформа для тих, хто хоче рости як кіберспортсмен, покращувати механічні навички, розуміти стратегію та впевнено прогресувати у обраній дисципліні.

Huba Football is your all-in-one destination for immersive and real-time football live scores. Whether you're tracking live matches, analyzing team stats or individual player performance, Huba Football brings you closer to the game with clarity and depth.

App Key Features:

* Live Scores & Match Center:
Follow every match as it happens with real-time scores, game status updates, and live commentary. Home, away, and neutral venues are clearly displayed with intuitive UI.

* Detailed Match Statistics:
Access comprehensive team stats including shots on/off goal, blocked shots, fouls, corner kicks, and pass accuracy — all visualized in a clean and readable format.

* Fixtures & Results:
Stay up to date with ongoing, upcoming, and past fixtures. Navigate through daily match schedules and browse through historical results.

* Lineups & Formations:
View team formations with visual representation. Analyze how each team sets up with formations like 4-2-3-1, including detailed player positions.

* Goal & Event Timelines:
Track every key match moment: goals (normal and penalties), player substitutions, yellow/red cards, and more — all timestamped and structured.

* Player Profiles & Stats:
Explore in-depth player statistics such as goals, assists, passes completed, dribbles attempted/successful, and more. Access player transfer history and trophy achievements per season.

* Instant Push Notifications:
Get notified in real-time for match starts, goals, cards, and final results — never miss a moment that matters.

* Team Overview & Stadium Info:
Discover team insights including home ground details, stadium capacity, playing surface, and recent form with last 6 game results.

* Latest Football News:
Browse football headlines tailored for you. View articles with images and story highlights from the football world, all updated daily.

* Search & Discover Leagues:
Easily search for global competitions with season filters. Quickly access league details and navigate through team performances.

* Cards Stats:
Monitor discipline across competitions — view players with red card stats in structured and ranked format.

* Transfer History & Trophies:
Follow a player’s career journey with transfer movements and club changes. Also explore their earned trophies and seasonal accolades.

Huba Football is designed for fans who crave precision, clarity, and real-time interaction with the beautiful game. No official team or league names are required — just pure football data delivered intelligently. Download Huba Football app now.

Welcome to MyLineups, the ultimate football lineup creator for fans, coaches, and players.

Bring your tactical ideas to life by effortlessly designing, customizing, and sharing football lineups.

Key Features:

• Create Your Lineups: Easily assemble your ideal formations, perfect for friendly matches, fantasy football, or testing tactical ideas.

• Save and Share Images: Quickly save your lineups to your device or instantly share them with teammates, friends, and followers on social media.

• Custom Kits: Showcase your team’s identity by designing personalized kits. Choose from various colors, patterns, and styles to make your squad uniquely yours.

• Official Kits: Add authenticity to your lineups with 1,000 official kits from clubs and national teams worldwide.

• Custom Players & Real-Life Stars: Combine your own custom players, including personal photos, with over 9,000 real football stars from our extensive database, including more than 100 legendary players. Build your dream team exactly as you envision it.

• Real Team Templates: Create lineups quickly using templates from 300 real football teams, complete with their latest official lineups and full player rosters. Experience managing your favorite real-life teams!

• Flexible Tactical Layouts: Effortlessly switch between different formations. Experiment freely to find the perfect tactical setup for your team.

• Adjustable Player Numbers: Play 11-a-side, futsal, or set your own number of players.

• Themes & Personalization: Change the look of your lineup by selecting from 6 predefined visual theme, or design your own from scratch.

MyLineups gives you a digital tactics board combined with a photo studio and social sharing tools. Perfect for coaches planning matches, players visualizing their positions, fantasy managers refining their choices, and passionate fans exploring tactics.

Download MyLineups today and start creating your ideal football lineups!
